class.rdfs:comment: Used to describe a seat, such as a reserved seat in an event reservation.
class.rdfs:label: Seat

schema:seatNumber.rdfs:comment: The location of the reserved seat (e.g., 27).
schema:seatNumber.rdfs:label: seatNumber

schema:seatRow.rdfs:comment: The row location of the reserved seat (e.g., B).
schema:seatRow.rdfs:label: seatRow

schema:seatSection.rdfs:comment: The section location of the reserved seat (e.g. Orchestra).
schema:seatSection.rdfs:label: seatSection
